description:
We Care About Your Rights

When facing a serious legal challenge that affects your life, your business or your future, you need an attorney on your side dedicated to protecting your rights and best interests while fighting hard to help you achieve the positive results you seek.

At Sand Law in Williston, North Dakota, we offer comprehensive legal services in a variety of practice areas in order to meet the needs of individuals, families and business owners throughout the western part of our great state.

Effective Support And Advocacy For Your Most Important Legal Needs

Founded by experienced attorneys Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, our law firm provides the highest level of representation possible to those dealing with legal challenges involving criminal defense, personal injury, business transactions and disputes, and more.

Backed by our years of experience and success as trial attorneys, we possess the skills and resources necessary to handle the demands of your case regardless of how complex or challenging. As a result of the exceptional service we provide, we have earned top ratings from our peers, and our law firm has received many positive reviews and referrals from satisfied clients.

Top-Rated Attorneys Working For You

Regarded as two of the top attorneys in the region, we will work closely with you to deliver the personalized attention your case deserves. After analyzing your situation and advising you of the best options you have available, we will then set about devising the most effective strategy or solution possible tailored to your specific needs and goals.

For the high-quality, effective assistance and support you need for your serious legal challenge, look no further than Sand Law. To discuss your needs free of charge, you can contact our law office to schedule a consultation.
